# Documentation

## ⚠️ Critical
- Update docs with code (same commit)
- Include examples
- Link, don't duplicate

## Structure
```
docs/
├── guides/        # How-to
├── features/      # Feature docs
├── technical/     # API reference
├── architecture/  # ADRs
└── development/   # Setup
```

## Placement
| Type | Location |
|------|----------|
| How-to | docs/guides/ |
| Feature | docs/features/ |
| API | docs/technical/ |
| Design | docs/architecture/ |
